title: Millenary Cusco 6D/5N

itinerary.day: Day 01: Travel to Cusco & City Tour

activities.text: Acclimatization morning: visit the Cathedral, Cristo Blanco viewpoint, San Cristóbal viewpoint, Regocijo Square, San Francisco Square, and more.
Q'enqo: Ceremonial labyrinth with underground galleries.
Tambomachay: Ritual water site and Inca resting place.

itinerary.day: Day 02: Sacred Valley of the Incas

activities.text: Pick-up and departure to the Sacred Valley.
Pisaq: Agricultural terraces, Intihuatana temple and modern town.
Urubamba: Buffet lunch. Then visit Maras Moray and Salt Mines.
Ollantaytambo: Inca fortress and religious/administrative buildings.
Chincheros: Textile town and colonial church. Return to hotel.

itinerary.day: Day 03: Visit to the Wonder of the World "Machu Picchu"

activities.text: Bus ride to Machu Picchu (30 min).
2-hour guided tour in Machu Picchu. Free time to explore afterwards.
Visit to the Inca Hot Springs in Aguas Calientes.
Return train to Ollantaytambo and private transfer to Cusco.

itinerary.day: Day 04: Puno - Lake Titicaca "Uros" - Copacabana Bolivia

activities.text: Boat tour to the Uros floating islands. Cultural exchange and games. Countryside lunch.
Visit to Copacabana (Bolivia): Basilica and sacred observatory of the Chiripa culture.
Tour to Chivay - Condor Route. Lunch.
City tour in Arequipa: Main Square, Cathedral, Cloisters, Church of the Company, Santa Catalina Monastery.
Free afternoon to visit chocolatiers and local shops. Travel to Cusco.

itinerary.day: Day 06: Free day in Cusco - Flight to Lima

activities.text: Transfer to airport for return flight to Lima.

includes: Tourist transportation by private bus Cusco – Puno – Arequipa.
05 dinners as detailed in the itinerary.
01 agency staff member accompanying the group throughout the trip.
Tours mentioned in the program, First aid kit.
Entrance tickets to all tourist sites.
